positions.subtitle: Lenovo
positions.description: 1.Played detective with data to uncover business secrets.2.Turned numbers into actionable insights for product and marketing magic.3.Tested new data sources—because who doesn’t love fresh data?4.Built custom algorithms that made customer experiences smoother than a fresh jar of peanut butter.5.Ran A/B tests to make sure our models were in tip-top shape.6.Teamed up with others to launch models and keep the data party going.
positions.title: Intern-Data Scientist
positions.description_html:
1.Played detective with data to uncover business secrets.

2.Turned numbers into actionable insights for product and marketing magic.

3.Tested new data sources—because who doesn’t love fresh data?

4.Built custom algorithms that made customer experiences smoother than a fresh jar of peanut butter.

5.Ran A/B tests to make sure our models were in tip-top shape.

6.Teamed up with others to launch models and keep the data party going.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: 1.Built regression models to predict Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)—like a fortune teller for Lenovo’s e-commerce.2.Fine-tuned models to make customer targeting as accurate as a bullseye.3.Measured model performance using fancy stats (MAE, RMSE) to keep everything on point.4.Used k-means clustering to create loyalty segments and supercharge direct marketing.
experience.description_html: 1.Built regression models to predict Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)—like a fortune teller for Lenovo’s e-commerce.2.Fine-tuned models to make customer targeting as accurate as a bullseye.3.Measured model performance using fancy stats (MAE, RMSE) to keep everything on point.4.Used k-means clustering to create loyalty segments and supercharge direct marketing. <!---->

experience.title: Network Planning Analyst
experience.description: 1.Streamlined workflows, boosting revenue by 20% and slashing customer complaints by over 50%. Happy customers, happy life!2.Automated 100,000+ 4G site entries with Python—bye-bye backlog!3.Helped expand Delhi’s 4G coverage by 10% through savvy vendor negotiations.4.Crafted PowerBI dashboards that turned raw data into gold for better decision-making.

Analyzed and brainstormed with management on IoT and 5G evolution opportunities—thinking ahead, always!3. recommendations: Apoorvi M. “Aadhar is my peer at Columbia University in the MS Applied Analytics program - and we took two classes together - statistical programming in R and data visualization in Tableau. I had a great experience studying with Aadhar for each of the courses, and even had the opportunity to work with him on a group project. What stood out the most about Aadhar was his ability to learn quickly and his enthusiastic approach towards his work. Further, he had a brilliant work ethic - he would always complete his portion of the work on time, and was never late to a single meeting, regardless of the hour of the day. In terms of his technical skill set, he is knowledgeable in Python, R, and Tableau too. Given that he did not previously have an understanding of these tools, it is impressive how rapidly he has upskilled himself, and sufficiently well to leverage these tools on various projects. Further, he was always willing to help others understand concepts taught in class, which is indicative of a leader who uplifts others and helps them succeed. Lastly, he was able to take a very detail-oriented approach towards his tasks which elevated the quality of whatever he worked on. I can say with confidence that Aadhar will be an asset to any organization that he works for since not only gives equal dedication to whatever he does but is also refreshingly open to feedback. Good luck with all your future endeavors, Aadhar!”
Deepak Ojha “Aadhar possesses exceptional communication skills, methodical and is very capable. His contribution to the Data Analytics project is excellent. He would be an asset to any company.”
projects: [{"title":"Predicting Optimal Frequency of Ad Campaigns for Kenvue(Johnson & Johnson)","start_date":"Aug 2023","end_date":"Dec 2023","description":"Optimizing ad effectiveness for Kenvue using regression and Random Forest model Enhanced ad effectiveness and sales by developing predictive models, optimizing data quality through EDA and wrangling, and achieving a test RMSE of 0.57"},{},{},{},{"title":"Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) with Deep Learning","start_date":"Aug 2023","end_date":"Sep 2023","description":"Built an ASR system using TensorFlow to convert audio spectrograms into text.● Processed audio data from the LJ Speech dataset, used Tensorflow to create DeepSpeech-2 inspired model,and trained the model using Adam optimizer to boost transcription accuracy"},{"title":"Safehouse NYC Web application - Cloud Computing","start_date":"Jan 2023","end_date":"May 2023","description":"1.Created a Flask-based real estate web app with crime statistics, aiding informed property decisions2. Created a Cloud-based data pipeline using Pyspark. Integrated Zillow and NYPD Crime data into Postgres and MongoDB.3. Bridged technology and real estate expertise to enhance user decision-making through innovative solutions"},{},{"title":"Twitter Analysis of ChatGPT Users","start_date":"Jan 2023","end_date":"May 2023","description":"1.Conducted an in-depth analysis of Twitter data related to ChatGPT users using unsupervised learning techniques in R.2. Leveraged bag-of-words representation to extract insights, identifying key themes, sentiments, and discussion topics3. Employed SARIMAX modeling to forecast user engagement and sentiment trends, enabling data-driven decision-making"},{},{},{"title":"Exploratory DataAnalysis of Call Center data using Python","start_date":"Feb 2023","end_date":"Feb 2023","description":"● Analyzed contact center data using Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib) in February 2023, identifying customer call causes.● Utilized text mining techniques with scikit-learn during exploratory data analysis, yielding valuable insights into call reasons● Produced data-backed visualizations (Matplotlib, Seaborn) that facilitated a 15% reduction in call volumes and a 10% increase incall handling efficiency, subsequently boosting customer sales by 20%."}]
